mapper.select: select ord.ORDER_STATE, srv.ACTIVE_TYPE, gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE as circuitcode, cst.apply_ord_id from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW srv left join gom_order ord on ord.order_id = srv.order_id and ord.ORDER_STATE != '200000005' left join gom_bdw_cst_ord cst on cst.cst_ord_id = srv.cst_ord_id join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID = srv.SRV_ORD_ID and gbsoai.ATTR_CODE = '20000064' where srv.SRV_ORD_ID in (select max(srv.SRV_ORD_ID) as SRV_ORD_ID from gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai join GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW gbsoi on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID = gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID join GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW srv on srv.INSTANCE_ID = gbsoi.INSTANCE_ID where gbsoai.ATTR_CODE = '20000064' and gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE = #{circuitCode} group by srv.INSTANCE_ID) --AND GBSOI.ACTIVE_TYPE IN(101,103,104,105,106) AND ORDER_STATE='200000004' --AND GBSOI.ACTIVE_TYPE IN(101,102,103,104,105,106)
select count(a.ATTR_VALUE) from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO a left join GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW b on a.srv_ord_id = b.srv_ord_id where a.ATTR_CODE = '20000064' and a.ATTR_VALUE = #{circuitCode}
SELECT c.APPLY_ORD_ID ,s.SRV_ORD_STAT,s.ACTIVE_TYPE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW s left join GOM_BDW_CST_ORD c on s.CST_ORD_ID = c.CST_ORD_ID where INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId}
